sense.def:
To anticipate an event
pomeni vnaprej ugotoviti, da se nekaj lahko zgodi, in se na dogodek pripraviti.

seg.quote: The Secretary had anticipated the question.
Petrol coupons were issued in anticipation of rationing.

sense.def:
To anticipate something
pomeni z veseljem pričakovati, da se bo zgodilo nekaj prijetnega ali vznemirljivega.

seg.quote: She had often pleasurably anticipated the moment when she would hand in her resignation.
"Please!" the children cried, jumping up and down in anticipation.
